verbose_text: The results showed that Schwann cell myelin loss and cJun and phospho-ERK1/2 activation in Slit2 +/-, Slit3-/-, and Robo1 +/- mice were not significantly different than control animals (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A-S5G), thus eliminating this possibility of faster Schwann cell dedifferentiation in these nerves driving earlier cell migration.
